name: Curries
description: Experience the vibrant and bold flavors of Thai curries. From the fiery heat of green curry to the milder but aromatic massaman curry, there's something for every spice level.

name: Noodles
description: From pad thai to drunken noodles, Thai cuisine is known for its delicious and varied noodle dishes.

name: Soups
description: Tom yum and tom kha gai are just a few examples of the rich and flavorful soups that Thai cuisine has to offer.

name: Salads
description: Thai salads are known for their bright and bold flavors, often featuring a combination of sweet, sour, spicy, and savory ingredients.

name: Stir-fries
description: Stir-frying is a popular cooking technique in Thai cuisine, allowing for quick and flavorful meals that are perfect for weeknight dinners.
